title: Slecting
text: Selecting note functionality works using the GET method for routing

title: Saving
text: Saving notes work using the POST method for routing. Unique id's are assigned here as well.

title: Deleting
text: Deleting notes also work using the DELETE method for routes. The code searches for that particular id and deletes the note. I had a slight issue where deleting a note would delete the entire JSON array but that was fixed.
